name: CarbonCreditPermissionListFactory
description: A Carbon Credit Token Whitelist Factory.

eventDecorators.name: PermissionListCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new permission list has been created by this factory.

parameterDecorators.name: permissionListAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the freshly deployed contract.

eventDecorators.name: SwappedImplementationContract
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the implementation contract has been swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the new implementation contract.

functionDecorators.name: createCarbonCreditPermissionList
functionDecorators.description: Deploy a new carbon credit permission list.

parameterDecorators.name: name_
parameterDecorators.description: - the name given to the newly deployed list.

parameterDecorators.name: owner_
parameterDecorators.description: - the address to which ownership of the deployed contract will be transferred.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the newly created list.

functionDecorators.name: deployedContractsCount
functionDecorators.description: The number of contracts deployed by this factory.

functionDecorators.name: implementationContract
functionDecorators.description: The implementation contract used to create new lists.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: swapImplementationContract
functionDecorators.description: The owner is able to swap out the underlying list implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: implementationContract_
parameterDecorators.description: - the contract to be used from now on.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
